job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience

jd: Hello My name is Yash Tiwari, and I am a Staffing Specialist at Infotech Spectrum. I am reaching out to you on an exciting job opportunity with one of our clients. Position: Infrastructure PMP with ITiL—This is A Contract to Full-Time OpportunityLocation: Coraopolis, PA 15106- HYBRID WORK MODEL 2 DAYS IN OFFICE 3 DAYS RESUME2 interview process:1st – with Director, CISO, and Software Manager2nd- with CIO Why open: Growth Business need: growth and ensure completed projects are documented currently and not impact business Job Responsibilities: Oversee all project budgetsLead all major projectsDefine project phases to ensure timely deliveryConducts meetings with IT Teams and Business UnitsProvide project updates and statusManage project issuesComplete project status-reviewsLead group of technical resources to ensure projects are documented correctly and moving along per planIdentify technical requirements from Business Units and IT Departments-DBA Team, Software Team and QA TeamQualifications: Education: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience a related area (computer science, finance, business administration) (a plus).7+ years experience in IT field3-5 years' experience as a Project ManagerExpertise in managing cross-functional teamsPMP or ITIL Certification Thank YouBest RegardsYash TiwariInfoTech Spectrum Inc2060, Walsh Ave, #120, Santa Clara, CA 95050Email : yash.tiwari@infotechspectrum.com Direct No.: 5512123123 Ext.- 136Web: www.infotechspectrum.com
